docTitle.titlePart: A New Reaction of N-Aryl-2-pyrimidinamines with Triphosgene. —

front.div:
A new de-
amination-self amination reaction of N-aryl-2-pyrimidinamines (I) with triphosgene as
the reagent is described. — (PRASHAD*, M.; HU, B.; KIM, H.-Y.; HAR, D.; REPIC,
O.; BLACKLOCK, T. J.; Tetrahedron Lett. 48 (2007) 12, 2087-2089; Process Res.
Dev., Chem. Anal. Dev., Novartis Pharm. Corp., East Hanover, NJ 07936, USA;
Eng.) — Mais
